title: 1008 How to Stay Calm in the Midst of Chaos
description:
“Give yourself permission for discomfort.”

On today's 5-minute Friday, Lewis details a five-step process to help you stay in control in moments of stress, letdown, or confusion. This simple plan can help you make the most of your toughest times.

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Tranforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/826-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
